function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Graphene derivatives with antimicrobial properties","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cytotoxicity of graphene derivatives due to negatively charged groups","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of promoting graphene derivatives as a primary solution for virus microorganisms.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper dispersion of nanomaterials like graphene and mnps may lead to reduced antimicrobial activity, allowing pathogens to spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interaction between bacteria and gbns containing surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of unproven
